description.narrative: Nam Long Investment Corporation (NLG, or the Company) is a leading affordable housing developer in Vietnam, who has 29 years of experience in construction and real estate and has developed more than 18,000 housing units in Ho Chi Minh City (HCMC) and surrounding provinces. Being one of the pre-eminent affordable housing developers in Southeast Asia, NLG has three product lines covering affordable apartment, premium affordable apartment and affordable townhouse. The Company mainly targets low- to middle-income households in Vietnam, with 84% of the Companys total sales units in 2019 contributed by affordable and premium affordable apartment products.

The most significant expected project-level effect is improved quality of life by giving the low-mid urban income population access to quality and affordable housing, schools, hospitals and commercial areas. The Project will also create jobs and positive environmental impacts. Beyond the project, IFC anticipates that success of the proposed investment will encourage other developers to serve the low-mid urban income population in other secondary cities in Vietnam.
